item.source: Little problem, when i added a contact form. [SOLVED]

item.title: Little problem, when i added a contact form. [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

imjohn10:

are you sure you have this saved as a php file and not a html file?

Firstly, wrap center tags around it to center it to the page. And if it’s contact.html, it will not work as the browser doesn’t know to act on any PHP functions. Rename it so that the file extension is PHP, everything should be work then.

Read full topic

item.title: Little problem, when i added a contact form. [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @nordiskhost nordiskhost
item.description:
@nordiskhost wrote:

Try just center it? if you want it in the center of the page, if not you shuld make it as a .html file

<center>
 // HTML e-mail formlier
  echo '<form method="post" action="' . $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] . '" />
  <p>
  
      <label for="naam">Ingame name:</label><br />
      <input type="text" id="naam" name="naam" value="' . (isset($_POST['naam']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['naam']) : '') . '" /><br />
      
      <label for="mail">Paypal e-mail adress:</label><br />
      <input type="text" id="mail" name="mail" value="' . (isset($_POST['mail']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['mail']) : '') . '" /><br />
      
      <label for="onderwerp">Amount of Coins.:</label><br />
      <input type="text" id="onderwerp" name="onderwerp" value="' . (isset($_POST['onderwerp']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['onderwerp']) : '') . '" /><br />
      
      <label for="bericht">Message:</label><br />
      <textarea id="bericht" name="bericht" rows="8" style="width: 400px;">' . (isset($_POST['bericht']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['bericht']) : '') . '</textarea><br />
      
      <input type="submit" name="submit" value=" Versturen " />
  </p>
  </form>';
}
</center>

item.title: Little problem, when i added a contact form. [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

fuck xd… i dont know where =/

Mind looking at it for a sec?? heres my page

[code]<?php
ob_start();
session_start();
?>

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd"> 
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head> 
	<title>Last Divine</title> 
<!--Meta Data---> 
	<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /> 
	<meta name="description" content="Last Divine - The online Massive RSPS" /> 
	<meta name="keywords" content="Last Divine - The online Massive RSPS!" /> 
	<meta name="author" content="Xion" /> 
	<link rel="shortcut icon" type="image/png" href="Contents/img/other/myicon.png">
<!--Main Styles---> 
	<link REL=StyleSheet HREF="Contents/mainstyle.css" TYPE="text/css" MEDIA=screen /> 
	<link REL=StyleSheet HREF="Contents/navmenu.css" TYPE="text/css" MEDIA=screen /> 
<!--Applet Styles---> 
	<link REL=StyleSheet HREF="Contents/sliderstyle.css" TYPE="text/css" MEDIA=screen /> 
	<link REL=StyleSheet HREF="Contents/newsboxstyle.css" TYPE="text/css" MEDIA=screen /> 
	<script type="text/javascript" src="http://turmoil-pkz.com/js/jquery/jquery.js"></script> 
<!--News & Slider Scripts---> 
	<script type="text/javascript" src="./js/jquery_1_4_2.js"></script> 
	<script type="text/javascript" src="./js/jquery_elide_1_3.js"></script> 
	<script type="text/javascript" src="./js/jquery_arturoSlider_0_9_5.js"></script> 
	<script type="text/javascript" src="./js/swfobject_2_2.js"></script> 
	<script type="text/javascript" src="./js/titlejs-4.js"></script>
<!--Google Anyaltics---> 
	<script type="text/javascript">

var _gaq = _gaq || [];
_gaq.push([’_setAccount’, ‘UA-23940048-2’]);
_gaq.push([’_trackPageview’]);

(function() {
var ga = document.createElement(‘script’); ga.type = ‘text/javascript’; ga.async = true;
ga.src = (‘https:’ == document.location.protocol ? ‘https://ssl’ : ‘http://www’) + ‘.google-analytics.com/ga.js’;
var s = document.getElementsByTagName(‘script’)[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
})();






Players Online:N/A
Server Status: Online
  • Home
  • Forums
  • Play Now
  • Download
  • Highscores
  • Vote4Reward
  • Donate

<?php

// E-mailadres van de ontvanger
$mail_ontv = ‘mitchvandenakker2@hotmail.com’; // <<<----- voer jouw e-mailadres hier in!

// Speciale checks voor naam en e-mailadres
if ($_SERVER[‘REQUEST_METHOD’] == ‘POST’)
{
// naam controle
if (empty($_POST[‘naam’]))
$naam_fout = 1;
// e-mail controle
if (function_exists(‘filter_var’) && !filter_var($_POST[‘mail’], FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL))
$email_fout = 1;
// antiflood controle
if (!empty($_SESSION[‘antiflood’]))
{
$seconde = 20; // 20 seconden voordat dezelfde persoon nog een keer een e-mail mag versturen
$tijd = time() - $_SESSION[‘antiflood’];
if($tijd < $seconde)
$antiflood = 1;
}
}

// Kijk of alle velden zijn ingevuld - naam mag alleen uit letters bestaan en het e-mailadres moet juist zijn
if (($_SERVER[‘REQUEST_METHOD’] == ‘POST’ && (!empty($antiflood) || empty($_POST[‘naam’]) || !empty($naam_fout) || empty($_POST[‘mail’]) || !empty($email_fout) || empty($_POST[‘bericht’]) || empty($_POST[‘onderwerp’]))) || $_SERVER[‘REQUEST_METHOD’] == ‘GET’)
{
if ($_SERVER[‘REQUEST_METHOD’] == ‘POST’)
{
if (!empty($naam_fout))
echo ‘

Your name is invalid

’;
elseif (!empty($email_fout))
echo ‘

Your e-mail is invalid

’;
elseif (!empty($antiflood))
echo ‘

U mag slechts één bericht per ’ . $seconde . ’ seconde versturen.

’;
else
echo ‘

You did not complete the whole order.

’;
}

// HTML e-mail formlier
echo ’

  <label for="naam">Ingame name:</label><br />
  <input type="text" id="naam" name="naam" value="' . (isset($_POST['naam']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['naam']) : '') . '" /><br />
  
  <label for="mail">Paypal e-mail adress:</label><br />
  <input type="text" id="mail" name="mail" value="' . (isset($_POST['mail']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['mail']) : '') . '" /><br />
  
  <label for="onderwerp">Amount of Coins.:</label><br />
  <input type="text" id="onderwerp" name="onderwerp" value="' . (isset($_POST['onderwerp']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['onderwerp']) : '') . '" /><br />
  
  <label for="bericht">Message:</label><br />
  <textarea id="bericht" name="bericht" rows="8" style="width: 400px;">' . (isset($_POST['bericht']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['bericht']) : '') . '</textarea><br />
  
  <input type="submit" name="submit" value=" Versturen " />
'; } // versturen naar else { // set datum $datum = date('d/m/Y H:i:s');

$inhoud_mail = “===================================================\n”;
$inhoud_mail .= "Ingevulde contact formulier " . $_SERVER[‘HTTP_HOST’] . “\n”;
$inhoud_mail .= “===================================================\n\n”;

$inhoud_mail .= "Ingame name: " . htmlspecialchars($_POST[‘naam’]) . “\n”;
$inhoud_mail .= "Paypal e-mail adress: " . htmlspecialchars($_POST[‘mail’]) . “\n”;
$inhoud_mail .= “Amount of Coins.:\n”;
$inhoud_mail .= htmlspecialchars($_POST[‘bericht’]) . “\n\n”;

$inhoud_mail .= "Verstuurd op " . $datum . " via het IP adres " . $_SERVER[‘REMOTE_ADDR’] . “\n\n”;

$inhoud_mail .= “===================================================\n\n”;

// --------------------
// spambot protectie
// ------
// van de tutorial: http://www.phphulp.nl/php/tutorial/beveiliging/spam-vrije-contact-formulieren/340/
// ------

$headers = ‘From: ’ . htmlspecialchars($_POST[‘naam’]) . ’ <’ . $_POST[‘mail’] . ‘>’;

$headers = stripslashes($headers);
$headers = str_replace(’\n’, ‘’, $headers); // Verwijder \n
$headers = str_replace(’\r’, ‘’, $headers); // Verwijder \r
$headers = str_replace(""", “\”", str_replace("\", “\\”, $headers)); // Slashes van quotes

$_POST[‘onderwerp’] = str_replace(’\n’, ‘’, $_POST[‘onderwerp’]); // Verwijder \n
$_POST[‘onderwerp’] = str_replace(’\r’, ‘’, $_POST[‘onderwerp’]); // Verwijder \r
$_POST[‘onderwerp’] = str_replace(""", “\”", str_replace("\", “\\”, $_POST[‘onderwerp’])); // Slashes van quotes

if (mail($mail_ontv, $_POST[‘onderwerp’], $inhoud_mail, $headers))
{
// zorg ervoor dat dezelfde persoon niet kan spammen
$_SESSION[‘antiflood’] = time();

  echo '<h1>Your order has been send</h1>
  
  <p>You will recieve your coins in 1/4 hours.</p>';

}
else
{
echo ‘

Error occurred, order has not been send.

’;
}
}
?> 
		<div id="actual-content"> 
			<br /> 
			<center>


[/code]

item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

I added a the same contact form on my website that i had on my old one (I use it as Donating page xD)

That time it gave the same error but someone did something so it was fixed…

Anyways this happens with i putted this php script into my website page:[code]<?php

// E-mailadres van de ontvanger
$mail_ontv = 'email// <<<----- voer jouw e-mailadres hier in!

// Speciale checks voor naam en e-mailadres
if ($_SERVER[‘REQUEST_METHOD’] == ‘POST’)
{
// naam controle
if (empty($_POST[‘naam’]))
$naam_fout = 1;
// e-mail controle
if (function_exists(‘filter_var’) && !filter_var($_POST[‘mail’], FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL))
$email_fout = 1;
// antiflood controle
if (!empty($_SESSION[‘antiflood’]))
{
$seconde = 20; // 20 seconden voordat dezelfde persoon nog een keer een e-mail mag versturen
$tijd = time() - $_SESSION[‘antiflood’];
if($tijd < $seconde)
$antiflood = 1;
}
}

// Kijk of alle velden zijn ingevuld - naam mag alleen uit letters bestaan en het e-mailadres moet juist zijn
if (($_SERVER[‘REQUEST_METHOD’] == ‘POST’ && (!empty($antiflood) || empty($_POST[‘naam’]) || !empty($naam_fout) || empty($_POST[‘mail’]) || !empty($email_fout) || empty($_POST[‘bericht’]) || empty($_POST[‘onderwerp’]))) || $_SERVER[‘REQUEST_METHOD’] == ‘GET’)
{
if ($_SERVER[‘REQUEST_METHOD’] == ‘POST’)
{
if (!empty($naam_fout))
echo ‘

Your name is invalid

’;
elseif (!empty($email_fout))
echo ‘

Your e-mail is invalid

’;
elseif (!empty($antiflood))
echo ‘

U mag slechts één bericht per ’ . $seconde . ’ seconde versturen.

’;
else
echo ‘

You did not complete the whole order.

’;
}

// HTML e-mail formlier
echo ’

  <label for="naam">Ingame name:</label><br />
  <input type="text" id="naam" name="naam" value="' . (isset($_POST['naam']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['naam']) : '') . '" /><br />
  
  <label for="mail">Paypal e-mail adress:</label><br />
  <input type="text" id="mail" name="mail" value="' . (isset($_POST['mail']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['mail']) : '') . '" /><br />
  
  <label for="onderwerp">Amount of Coins.:</label><br />
  <input type="text" id="onderwerp" name="onderwerp" value="' . (isset($_POST['onderwerp']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['onderwerp']) : '') . '" /><br />
  
  <label for="bericht">Message:</label><br />
  <textarea id="bericht" name="bericht" rows="8" style="width: 400px;">' . (isset($_POST['bericht']) ? htmlspecialchars($_POST['bericht']) : '') . '</textarea><br />
  
  <input type="submit" name="submit" value=" Versturen " />
'; } // versturen naar else { // set datum $datum = date('d/m/Y H:i:s');

$inhoud_mail = “===================================================\n”;
$inhoud_mail .= "Ingevulde contact formulier " . $_SERVER[‘HTTP_HOST’] . “\n”;
$inhoud_mail .= “===================================================\n\n”;

$inhoud_mail .= "Ingame name: " . htmlspecialchars($_POST[‘naam’]) . “\n”;
$inhoud_mail .= "Paypal e-mail adress: " . htmlspecialchars($_POST[‘mail’]) . “\n”;
$inhoud_mail .= “Amount of Coins.:\n”;
$inhoud_mail .= htmlspecialchars($_POST[‘bericht’]) . “\n\n”;

$inhoud_mail .= "Verstuurd op " . $datum . " via het IP adres " . $_SERVER[‘REMOTE_ADDR’] . “\n\n”;

$inhoud_mail .= “===================================================\n\n”;

// --------------------
// spambot protectie
// ------
// van de tutorial: http://www.phphulp.nl/php/tutorial/beveiliging/spam-vrije-contact-formulieren/340/
// ------

$headers = ‘From: ’ . htmlspecialchars($_POST[‘naam’]) . ’ <’ . $_POST[‘mail’] . ‘>’;

$headers = stripslashes($headers);
$headers = str_replace(’\n’, ‘’, $headers); // Verwijder \n
$headers = str_replace(’\r’, ‘’, $headers); // Verwijder \r
$headers = str_replace(""", “\”", str_replace("\", “\\”, $headers)); // Slashes van quotes

$_POST[‘onderwerp’] = str_replace(’\n’, ‘’, $_POST[‘onderwerp’]); // Verwijder \n
$_POST[‘onderwerp’] = str_replace(’\r’, ‘’, $_POST[‘onderwerp’]); // Verwijder \r
$_POST[‘onderwerp’] = str_replace(""", “\”", str_replace("\", “\\”, $_POST[‘onderwerp’])); // Slashes van quotes

if (mail($mail_ontv, $_POST[‘onderwerp’], $inhoud_mail, $headers))
{
// zorg ervoor dat dezelfde persoon niet kan spammen
$_SESSION[‘antiflood’] = time();

  echo '<h1>Your order has been send</h1>
  
  <p>You will recieve your coins in 1/4 hours.</p>';

}
else
{
echo ‘

Error occurred, order has not been send.

’;
}
}
?>[/code]
